long_description: The Harmony House Backpacking Kit features 18 zip pouches of dehydrated vegetables and beans allowing you to make your own tasty trail dishes! Kit includes: carrots (2), diced potatoes (2), green peas (2), tomato dices, sweet celery, cut green beans, sweet corn, green cabbage, red and green peppers and chopped onions. Kit also includes: black beans, northern beans, lentils, red beans and pinto beans. 1 kit provides over 70 servings; number of servings and serving size vary per pouch. Add approximately 1 part vegetables to 2 parts water and allow to soften, or use directly in soups and stews and simmer until done. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The Harmony House Backpacking Kit features 18 zip pouches of dehydrated vegetables and beans allowing you to make your own tasty trail dishes!
